attributes.action: Halt the geoengineering experiment by UK scientists with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details: Immediately halt the geoengineering experiment here in the UK.
attributes.background: A call for the halt of the proposed Geoengineering Experiment at the cost of 50 million pounds announced this week April 2025 by UK scientists. Solar radiation management (SRM) could have serious unintended consequences, such as shifting rains vital to food production.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
